Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department for the aging to report annually on senior centers within public housing developments

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to establishing a public housing liaison within the department for the aging

Items.MatterName: Establishing a public housing liaison within the department for the aging.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Koo, Cumbo, Brooks-Powers, Gjonaj, Menchaca, Riley, Rosenthal, Salamanca, Adams and Van Bramer.
